name: PDF For WooCommerce –  Invoices & Packing Slips + Drag And Drop Template Builder
author: add-ons.org

sections.description:
The PDF For WooCommerce add-on is an additional plugin that extends the functionality of WooCommerce by providing features for generating PDF files from form submissions and attaching files to email notifications.

WooCommerce PDF is a helpful tool that helps you build and customize the PDF Templates for WooCommerce. The plugin provides sufficient base elements and Gravity Forms elements as well as developmental tools for users to build a completed pdf. You can easily drag and drop, edit and style for transaction pdf using Layouts, insert desire contents with no coding knowledge required, and adds a PDF to the email sent out to your customers. Overall, you need to do is a couple of mouse clicks to create and experience your pdf template that will be sent to your customers.

Features

*-Easy use
*-Easily drag and drop elements to build and customize PDFs: – The user-friendly pdf template builder allows you to build professional and outstanding WooCommerce PDF templates.
*-Automatically email the PDF to both the admin and the user as soon as the form is complete
*-Download the PDF from the order admin page
*-Customize pdf template by adding your store logo, store name, and more..
*-Live Preview of Changes – visually observe pdfs by the preview, update any changes in the preview mode!
*-Choose template available
*-Manager Fonts
*-Choose Paper Size, DPI,..
*-Multilanguage support
*-Signature fields support
*-Conditional Logic Support
*-And more…

DEMO

https://pdf.add-ons.org/
sections.installation:
Normal installation

  1. Download the woocommerce.zip file to your computer.
  2. Unzip the file.
  3. Upload the plugin.zip directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
    Document include in plugin
sections.reviews:
Author

By add-ons.org (rednumber) on April 12, 2024

It's free!

We hope everyone will give us feedback so we can continue to develop!

Thank you
